overview: A film about the controversial Belgian multidisciplinary figure, known for his theater stagings, his choreography, his ballpoint pen art, and even bicycle racing. This fictitious portrait projects Jan Fabre into his own imaginative universe and composes a character who changes ceaselessly identity, plays numerous roles under the most varied disguises; behind a mask, still another mask… The female character, like a ‘demon of passage’ using different faces, haunts the male character and inspires his metamorphoses, ad infinitum.
title: Doctor Fabre Will Cure You
